column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I ordered the Maui Meatloaf while my boyfriend ordered the Short Rib Chilaquiles. The flavors in my dish were impeccable
column2: but the texture was so uniform that I sincerely thought that the steamed rice was mashed potatoes. I had to steal a handful of chips from my boyfriend's dish to use as a contrast! My boyfriend's dish was fantastic as well
column3: but we couldn't seem to locate an adequate amount of meat in it (even though lighting is dim in there
column4: we don't think that's the problem).
